member.summary: The xml description of the encounter

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.Chart
member.summary: The xml description of the encounter

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoGroupHeadings
member.summary: Suppress group headings

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoDoctorHeadings
member.summary: Suppress doctor headings, such as 'The doctor ordered the following therapy'.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoPatientHPIString
member.summary: Suppress the patient HPI string, 'The patient is a nn year old gender, …'

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.BodyOnly
member.summary: Limit the narrative output of Rich Text or HTML to that of the body portion of the document

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoTableRanges
member.summary: Don't include the 'Normal range' column in tables

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.InlineBullets
member.summary: Special narrative presentation for outline format only of the Physical Examination group which inserts a 'bullet' character as separation for positive findings and a '°' character for negative findings; each finding is narrated in sentence form with some pruning of sentence lead-in phrasing. Findings within a section are sequenced positives followed by negatives. In addition, onset dates in the history section will present a hyphen instead of the 'as of' string preceding the onset string. The HPI group will also use the positive and negative bullets.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NarrateHeader
member.summary: Narrative generation will include a header string emitted prior to the first narrative group.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoOneLineTables
member.summary: When set, physical exam and test tables (other than the stress test tables) that have only one entry will be narrated in a prose paragraph style rather than in a table structure.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.SpaceBeforeNegHPI
member.summary: A blank line will emit prior to the all-negative body systems paragraph of the HPI narrative group.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoSeparateNegHPI
member.summary: HPI body systems with all negative findings are sequenced as the last section in HPI as a single paragraph. Setting this option sequences the negative findings within their specified body system sequence.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.CCSystemFirst
member.summary: If the chief complaint narrative group contains a coded symptom finding other than the chief complaint free text finding and this option is enabled, the body system of that finding will be sequenced first in HPI and ROS regardless of the user's designated sub-group sequence.

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.NoTableHeadings
member.summary: Suppress table headings

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.NarrationHandler.ShowChapterHeadings
member.summary: Show chapter headings

member.name: P:Medicomp.Web.KB.EMChartHandler.Override
